Differential Equations | A fairly general solution involving convolution.

[imath]\boldsymbol{a} \boldsymbol{y}^{\prime \prime}+\boldsymbol{b} \boldsymbol{y}^{\prime}+\boldsymbol{c} \boldsymbol{y}=\boldsymbol{f}(\boldsymbol{t})[/imath]\nSolution of [imath] \mathbf{c} [/imath] Nonhomogeneous Differentiol Equation\n[imath]y=k_{0} y_{1}+k_{1} y_{2}+\frac{1}{a} f \star y_{2}[/imath]
